name: LetterGuessGame
0:
”Alexa open letter guess game”
”Alexa start letter guess game”
”Alexa ask letter guess game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter guess game
des: Guess a letter, and Alexa will tell you if you need to guess before or after she picked. After guessing the letter, she will also tell you how many tries it took you to guess the letter. See if you can guess in five tries or less! For the little ones that need help, Alexa can provide additional clues too!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
